entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Snow beginning this morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late this afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. Forecast issued 06:51 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening then partly cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 near midnight. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:51 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 06:51 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023
